entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 23 January 2023
